wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Good post. I think this concept intersects with the phenomenon of "cargo cult" programming to some degree. On my team, the old timers are in the habit of setting local references to Nothing when using VB.NET. Ie,
Public Sub Foo() Dim x As New Object ' Use x x = Nothing End Sub
Nobody can explain how this got started and I've had some extreme difficulty explaining this is not necessary.
